attributes.action: create a law which can give Grand Parents rights to access to Grand Children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
There is already a petition on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/grandparents/
reasons: Information which may be protected by an injunction or court order
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
